channel.title: Running 508 hd client on windows vista
channel.description: hello i need help im pretty sure running hd client on windows vista is different than xp, because i had all things needed, cache508, hd server, hd client, .titana_cache_32, titana is put in :C/, but i still get error ... can anyone help ? ----------------------------------------------------------------EDIT i did research and what i have accomedated is that .titana_cache_32 is not supported by windows vista, thus meaning Running HD Client/Server is prohibited? Is this true, if so please tell me if isn't than please tell me what cache i need.

item.title: Running 508 hd client on windows vista
item.dc:creator: @sethscape508 sethscape508
item.description:
@sethscape508 wrote:

hello i need help im pretty sure running hd client on windows vista is different than xp, because i had all things needed, cache508, hd server, hd client, .titana_cache_32, titana is put in :C/, but i still get error … can anyone help ?
----------------------------------------------------------------EDIT
i did research and what i have accomedated is that .titana_cache_32 is not supported by windows vista, thus meaning Running HD Client/Server is prohibited? Is this true, if so please tell me if isn’t than please tell me what cache i need.

Read full topic
